name: ralrimia
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), w1)

comment: Inference from Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90 (restricted quantifier version). (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
